title: The Land is me
brief_description: In addition to writing and singing the theme song, 10 year old Shannon scripted, animated and helped edit this short film about the impact of early Australian settlement on Aboriginal cultures. Overall Winner of the Screen It! competition 2004. An animated short entered to “Create a moving image work on the theme ‘Pacific Explorer” section of ACMI’s ‘Screen It’ media making competition for Primary Schools.
